title: Aware Super chases AI boom with $460m data centre deal

title: California Launches Investigation Into Elon Musk’s xAI Over Deepfake Sexual Images as Global Scrutiny Intensifies

title: Hires” as Regulators Warn of Antitrust Evasion in AI Talent Deals
description: The U.S. Federal Trade Commission is signaling a potential crackdown on a fast-growing hiring strategy used by major technology companies, warning that so-called “acqui-hires” may be deployed to sidestep antitrust scrutiny in the race to dominate artificial intelligence. title: South Korean KOSPI Hits Record High as Automakers Rally on AI Technology Optimism
description: South Korean shares achieved a record high on Monday, with the KOSPI index closing at 4,904.66 points, up 1.32% and extending gains to a 12th consecutive session. Automakers led the rally, with Hyundai Motor surging 16.22% to an all-time high and Kia gaining 12.18% on artificial intelligence optimism. Foreign investors were net buyers worth ₹552.30 billion won, while technology stocks like LG Electronics and HYBE also posted strong gains.
content: South Korean equities reached a historic milestone on Monday, with the benchmark KOSPI index surging to an unprecedented closing high, driven by strong investor optimism around artificial intelligence technologies and robust performance in the automo... [3462 chars]

title: Notes from Davos: Before the conversations begin
description: Delegates have arrived in Davos for the World Economic Forum. The town is alive with activity, with pavilions setting up and early conversations beginning. Artificial intelligence is a dominant theme this year, with a focus on practical applications and global coordination. Security is in place, and the stage is set for a week of intense dialogue and networking.
